seo.title: Manarola Maps 2025 | Village Map & Hiking Trails
seo.description: Interactive and downloadable maps of Manarola. Village streets, hiking trails, points of interest, and transportation.

body.title: Maps & Navigation
body.subtitle: Navigate Manarola with detailed maps. Find hiking trails, restaurants, viewpoints, and all major attractions.

features.title: Village Map
features.description: Detailed street map showing restaurants, hotels, shops, and the main piazza.

features.title: Hiking Trails Map
features.description: All trails from Manarola including Via dell'Amore and routes to other villages.

features.title: Photo Spots Map
features.description: Best viewpoints and photography locations marked with optimal timing.

features.title: Transportation Map
features.description: Train station location, parking areas, and bus stops clearly marked.

features.title: Dining & Shopping
features.description: All restaurants, cafes, wine bars, and shops pinpointed on interactive map.

features.title: Swimming Areas Map
features.description: Rocky beaches and swimming spots with accessibility information.
